runs.comm: round the wicket, angling in towards middle and off, plays straight but the ball turns to take the outside edge past point
Ashraful steps outside the line to sweep that square but misses
gets forward and drops that into the off side
goes hard at that one, bowled flat outside off and it turns in just a hint, swept over the square leg fielder for a boundary
the slog-sweep this time, in front of square, over midwicket for a couple of runs, Saeed Ajmal runs across in the deep to his left and cuts it off
flat on the off, gets forward and pushes it back down the pitch
oversteps, pitched on a length on the off, pushes it past midwicket for a single, time for a freehit
scooped for four, gets across, well outside off and picks it neatly over short fine leg for a boundary
goodish length outside off, gets forward and chops it towards point
pushed it fuller outside off and Ashraful mistimes a drive back to the bowler
some away swing for Tanvir, knocks that one down in front of point for a quick single
shortish outside off and Ashraful tried to cut that through point, good bounce for the bowler and it just goes past the outside edge
nicely bowled again, more swing for Tanvir, short of a good length and it nips away, tries to chop that one but misses
lands on a good length on the off, pushes it back down the pitch
Bangladesh have begun confidently here, short of a length and it's pulled through midwicket for a boundary, got back quickly to dispatch that
wayward delivery. Tamim charged out of the crease to smash that over the infield on the off side but missed, was too wide from him and it swung away further, and neither keeper nor slip got behind it
lovely comeback, shortish but nipped back in from the off stump, Tamim tried to punch that belatedly over midwicket, missed
shortish outside off, flirts with that one, was looking to open the face but it sped past the bat
slashed away hard, width, more than the previous delivery, and he cashed in, smacking it hard over point for four more
good stuff from Tamim, Gul holds it back further, drops it short on the off and Tamim swings that one hard over midwicket for a boundary
inside edge and four, Ashraful charges out of the crease to send that length ball over the leg-side field but it was a touch too wide, nevertheless, he got an inside edge to beat fine leg for four
that one swung in, was much straighter and Ashraful stepped out trying to repeat the shot but missed, and the middle stump was knocked back
slides that one down the leg side first up and it's called a wide
short of a good length on the off, defends it watchfully into the leg side from the crease
dropped it shorter on middle, Shakib tried to swing that over square leg but missed, struck on the arm
pitches that on a length and he picks that high over extra cover for a couple of runs
hitting the ball hard there, on target on middle and off, Shakib gets behind that and knocks it in front of the bowler
uppish but in the gap, shortish outside off, turns away and he handles it well, gets on the back foot and cuts it wide of the diving point for a boundary
short on the leg stump, whips it hard behind square off the back foot, stylishly done and it fetches him another four
gets forward and works that towards square leg for a single
floating it on middle, drives that into the leg side for a single
gets on the back foot and punches that to mid-on for one more
shortish on the off, gets back and pushes that to mid-off for a single
gets back and chops it towards point
picks the gap between point and backward point, short and it's easy pickings, cuts it crisply into that gap for a boundary
Shakib is on the attack, short and it's dispatched with ease past cover, width, room and he doesn't waste the chance
three in a row, Shakib being cheeky this time, angling on the pads and he delicately turns it down to the fine-leg boundary

Run-out, pushed towards mid-on, Tamim called for the single but Shakib sent him back, Tamim, on the way back, lost his balance, slipped and Hafeez didn't risk throwing the ball, ran towards the non-striker's end and dislodged the bails to find Tamim miles short
uppish but just short, pitched up and that was struck straight to mid-on but it got to him on the bounce
Mushfiqur defends that towards point, HAfeez runs in and throws at stumps at the non-striker's end but Shakib has made it back
dabs that one wide of Gul at cover for a single
on middle and off, pushes that past the bowler for a single
slips that one down the leg side and it's called a wide
well fielded at point, short outside off and it was cut well but the point fielder threw himself to his left to keep them down to just a single, Hafeez it was
slightly short on the off, gets back and punches it to the left to Afridi, no single on offer
fires it flat on leg stump and that's whipped straight to short fine
flattish on the off, gets across and pushes it back to the bowler
nicely played, moves back and cuts it through point into the deep for a couple of runs
a flat six, nicely done by Mushfiqur, floated it outside off, got across and swept it hard over the deep midwicket boundary, powerfully struck, went hard and flat and cleared the ropes by  a distance
short on middle, gets on the back foot to turn it to midwicket
shortish on middle, punched off the back foot to long-on for a single
leading edge, flat on middle and gets it to turn away, Shakib closes the face a little early and it lands short of extra cover
angling towards middle, gets across and turns it down to short fine
another one nudged towards short fine, no single on offer as Tanvir cuts it off
Gul dives but can't quite prevent them from taking three, edged as Mushfiqur went for a big drive, Gul dived full length at short fine, to his wrong side, chased, slid and then returned a good throw
fullish on the off and that's been mistimed back to the bowler
an attempted slog-sweep, there is a fielder at deep midwicket and this one's struck straight to him, along the ground
quicker through the air, bowled full on middle and that's been pushed back down the track
shortish on the off, turning away, punches that towards deep cover for a single
closes the face on that one, not sure if it held its line but he got a leading edge towards point
shortish on the off, jabs that one back towards the bowler
superbly cut, shortish outside off and there was a bit more pace on that one, played past the diving point but just for a couple in the end
slower through the air this time, Shakib went for a big sweep and missed, or so we thought. There may have been a faint bottom-edge and it went through Kamran Akmal's legs, four runs
drives that inside out and imparts a good amount of power, was angled towards leg stump and Shakib stepped out to launch that into the gap between deep extra cover and long-off for a one bounce four
bowled on a good length on the off, pushed towards mid-off on the front foot
shortish outside off, that's been guided down to third man for a single
it's gone the distance, Shakib is not going to let those go, short on the off and it's pulled away hard over the deep midwicket boundary
dispatched again, short and wide, poor follow-up ball, slashed away over point, third man had no chance
goodish length, comes down the track and cracks that towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it to point
too close to cut but Shakib still manages to do it well, chopped but to short third man, straight to the fielder
shortish on the off, jabs it back towards the bowler who fumbles to allow them a single
flighted on the off and that's driven down the ground to long-off for a single
slowed it up considerably and it almost did the trick, Shakib tried to pull that over midwicket but was into the shot too early, got a top edge and it landed safe
turns in from middle, strikes him high on the pads as he tries to play forward
fires it flat outside off, tries to pull but it doesn't bounce as much as he'd like, swings and misses

dropped a dolly, one of the easiest catches put down, drops it short and Mushfiqur went for the pull, came onto him a touch too quickly and he got it low on the bat, Tanvir at midwicket, astonishingly, couldn't hold on, had it covered but fluffed it
Shakib's lucky, short on the off and he tries to pull it square, gets a top edge over the keeper's head for a boundary, was the slower bouncer
Shakib reaches his half-century in style, Arafar drops short outside off and he's played that shot very well today, has no trouble smashing it over the deep midwicket boundary
dropped, but won't be fair to call it that. Excellent effort from Afridi who flings himself to his left at mid-off, one handed, but couldn't hold on. Shakib came down the track and struck that hard
angling in towards middle, fullish and it's clipped straight to midwicket, no run this time
shortish on the off, chops that through point into the deep for a single
angling in towards middle, goes on straight, defended into the off side off the back foot
slides that down the leg side, the umpire isn't going to spare those
slower through the air, Mushfiqur spotted it, ended up being a half-tracker, it landed short, he moved back to pull it hard through midwicket
short and wide, cut towards point for a single
the slow legspinner and Shakib pulls that hard to deep midwicket for a single
shortish on the off, rocks back and cracks it to deep cover for one more
length ball on middle and leg, Mushfiqur made room and chipped it over the bowler's head for a single
pushes that straight to mid-off, no single taken even though there seemed to be one on offer
slower one bowled on middle, driven towards deep midwicket for a single

Mushfiqur is caught in the deep, short on middle and it's pulled away, high but not middled as well as he would have liked, straight to deep midwicket where Nazir takes a good catch running to his right
Shakib's looking splendid here, picked the slower ball, came down the pitch and lofted it clean between long-off and deep cover for a one bounce four
short outside off and it's dragged back towards the bowler
pushes it full and it's driven back to the bowler
Mahmudullah's holed out, tossed up, tempting delivery and Mahmudullah is tempted, tries to launch it over long-on but can't get it past Umar Akmal
fires it quick on middle, pushes it past the bowler for a single to get off the mark
fullish on the off and it's driven towards long-on for one more
beaten as Afridi slowed it up, the conventional legspinner, Nasir played at it and got a thin edge that was dropped by Kamran Akmal, sharp chance put down
survives again as it lands safe in the square-leg region, pulled loosely at that one and got the top edge
shortish on the off, Nasir gets back and punches it back to the bowler
quicker one, short on middle and off and it's pulled wide of long-on for a couple of runs
shortish on the off, gets back and knocks it down into the leg side for a single
fires in a yorker outside off, or its yorker length and it's dug out towards point
shortish on the off, runs that down towards short third man for a single
drives it down to long-on for a single
full toss on middle and it's scooped superbly by Shakib, there's Tanvir at fine leg but while he gets across, he can't drag it back in, ends up palming it back onto the ropes
quick yorker just outside off and Shakib fails to get his bat down in time

tries another scoop and it doesn't quite work out this time, plays it back to Kamran, gets an inside edge onto the pads and it rolls over to Kamran. Gul has a thing or two to say to Shakib for his audacity
struck hard towards mid-off, low full toss and it's driven hard and Umar Akmal misfields it to concede a couple of runs
poor line from Umar Gul, lands full on the pads and it's flicked away with ease, lands just inside the ropes, Bangladesh have gone past 150
Another poor delivery, too full, Shakib dances down the pitch and converts that into the a full toss to smack it past extra cover
Ajmal drops that a little short outside off, guided behind point where Gul's a little slow to get to it, but just a single in the end
fires that quick on leg stump from round the wicket, drives it wide of long-on for a couple of runs
scoops that one past short fine, angling towards middle and gets it past Jamshed, who gives chase and ultimately drags it back in, but three more
comes down the track and tries to close the face, it clips the pad and Nasir races down to the other end
drives that one down to long-off for a single
had made room for himself but Ajmal stilled floated it wide of the off stump, the result: creamed over extra cover for four more
slower one bowled short outside off and it's slapped towards deep cover for a single
makes room and Arafat chases him, is accurate, landing it in the blockhole outside leg, he digs it out into the leg side for a single

slow full toss on the off and Shakib times it well but not well enough to clear long-off, lofts it straight to Umar Akmal, the umpire wants to check if Yasir overstepped, and whether the ball was over waist high. The replays show all was clean. Shakib has to go
fullish on middle, driven towards long-on for a single
a boundary, shortish outside off, cuts it away over point for a boundary, made some room while simultaneously taking a couple of steps forward
bowled'im, made too much room this time and failed to reach a straight delivery to be bowled
